titleStmt.title: Satan the leader in chief to all who resist the reparation of Sion. As it was cleared in a sermon to the Honourable House of Commons at their late solemn fast, Febr. 28. 1643. By Robert Baylie, minister at Glasgow. Published by order of the House of Commons.
titleStmt.author: Baillie, Robert, 1599-1662.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Samuel Gellibrand, at the Brasen Serpent in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Wing has publication year 1643[4]; Thomason catalogue lists under 1644.
With a preliminary order to print.
Running title reads: A sermon preached before the Honourable House of Commons.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Brasen Serpent in Pauls Church-yard
